title: The Philadelphia Story
description: When a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.

title: The Grapes of Wrath
description: A poor Midwest family is forced off their land. They travel to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.

title: Rebecca
description: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

title: His Girl Friday
description: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

title: The Great Dictator
description: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

title: Pinocchio
description: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.

title: Fantasia
description: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music.

title: The Shop Around the Corner
description: Two employees at a gift shop can barely stand each other, without realizing that they are falling in love through the mail as anonymous pen pals.

title: The Thief of Bagdad
description: A young thief, with the help of a genie, must save a princess from an evil sorcerer.

title: The Mortal Storm
description: A German family is torn apart by the rise of Nazism.

title: The Bank Dick
description: A lazy, henpecked, heavy-drinking man is hired as a bank guard and accidentally foils a robbery.

title: Foreign Correspondent
description: On the eve of World War II, a young American reporter tries to expose enemy agents in London.

title: The Letter
description: The wife of a rubber plantation manager claims to have killed a man in self-defense, but a blackmailer's letter may prove otherwise.

title: Northwest Passage
description: A colonial-era American artist joins a British major on a perilous expedition to find the Northwest Passage.

title: The Sea Hawk
description: An English privateer captures a Spanish galleon and frees the slaves, but his troubles are not over.

title: My Favorite Wife
description: A man's wife, presumed dead, returns on the day of his remarriage.

title: The Mark of Zorro
description: A young aristocrat dons a mask and cape to protect the people of Spanish California from a corrupt governor.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: Five sisters from an English family of landed gentry must deal with issues of marriage, morality and misconceptions.

title: The Westerner
description: A drifter is accused of horse theft and is brought before the notorious Judge Roy Bean, who finds an unlikely kinship with the accused.

title: Howards of Virginia
description: A Virginia frontiersman fights in the American Revolution and builds a life for his family.

title: The Long Voyage Home
description: The crew of a British cargo ship during World War II must deal with the loneliness of the sea, the constant threat of attack, and their own personal demons.

title: Citizen Kane
description: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud'.

title: The Maltese Falcon
description: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a beautiful liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.

title: How Green Was My Valley
description: At the turn of the century in a Welsh mining village, the Morgans, a family of miners, struggle with labor strife and the disintegration of their family.

title: Sullivan's Travels
description: A director of escapist comedies goes on the road as a hobo to learn about life, which gives him a rude awakening.

title: The Lady Eve
description: A trio of classy card sharps targets a socially awkward brewery heir, but their plan is compromised when the femme fatale falls for their mark.

title: Sergeant York
description: Amarksman is drafted in WWI, and ends up becoming a hero.

title: Dumbo
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.

title: The Wolf Man
description: A practical man returns to his ancestral home in Wales and meets a young woman while fending off a werewolf.

title: High Sierra
description: After being released from prison, a notorious bank robber plans one last heist, but his plans are complicated by a woman he meets and a double-crossing.

title: Suspicion
description: A shy young woman marries a charming man, only to suspect him of murder and of plotting to kill her for her inheritance.

title: Ball of Fire
description: A group of professors writing an encyclopedia take in a nightclub singer who is on the run from the mob.

title: Meet John Doe
description: A reporter invents a story about a man who threatens to commit suicide on Christmas Eve in protest of the state of the nation. The story becomes a sensation, and the reporter must find a real 'John Doe' to play the part.

title: The Little Foxes
description: A Southern matriarch will stop at nothing to protect her family and their fortune, even if it means betraying her own.

title: Man Hunt
description: A British hunter is captured by the Gestapo after an unsuccessful attempt to assassinate Adolf Hitler.

title: Here Comes Mr. Jordan
description: A boxer is accidentally taken to heaven 50 years before his time. He is returned to Earth in the body of a wealthy man who has just been murdered by his wife.

title: The Devil and Daniel Webster
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic Picture
description: A farmer sells his soul to the devil to save his farm. When the devil comes to collect, he is defended by the famed lawyer Daniel Webster.

title: The Strawberry Blonde
description: A dentist in 1890s New York reflects on his past, when he fell for a beautiful woman who ended up marrying his rival.

title: Ladies in Retirement
description: A housekeeper's two mentally unstable sisters come to visit, and their presence threatens to unravel a dark secret.

title: The Sea Wolf
description: Survivors of a shipwreck are rescued by a seal-hunting vessel, but find themselves trapped by the ship's tyrannical captain.

title: Casablanca
description: A cynical American expatriate's cafe in Casablanca becomes a haven for refugees, and his life is turned upside down when his former lover appears.

title: Mrs. Miniver
description: A British family struggles to survive the first months of World War II.

title: The Magnificent Ambersons
description: The declining fortunes of a wealthy Midwestern family and the social changes brought by the automobile age.

title: Yankee Doodle Dandy
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: The life of the renowned musical composer, playwright, actor, dancer, and singer George M. Cohan.

title: To Be or Not to Be
description: During the Nazi occupation of Poland, a troupe of actors use their disguises and acting skills to fool the occupying troops.

title: Bambi
description: The story of a young deer growing up in the forest.

title: Now, Voyager
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A frumpy, repressed spinster blossoms under the care of a sympathetic psychiatrist and embarks on a life-changing sea voyage.

title: The Pride of the Yankees
description: The story of the life and career of the famous baseball player, Lou Gehrig.

title: Woman of the Year
description: Rival reporters Sam and Tess fall in love and get married, only to find their relationship strained when Tess' skyrocketing career grabs the spotlight.

title: Holiday Inn
description: At an inn which is open only on holidays, a crooner and a hoofer vie for the affections of a beautiful up-and-coming performer.

title: Cat People
description: An American man marries a Serbian immigrant who fears that she will turn into the cat person of her homeland's fables if they are intimate together.

title: The Palm Beach Story
description: A married couple's relationship is put to the test when the wife runs off to Florida to find a rich man to finance her husband's architectural dreams.

title: Random Harvest
description: A World War I veteran suffering from amnesia falls in love with a music hall star, but an accident restores his original memories while erasing his new life.

title: This Gun for Hire
description: A hitman seeks revenge when he is double-crossed by his employer, all while being pursued by the police and a beautiful nightclub singer.

title: Saboteur
description: A young aircraft worker is falsely accused of sabotage and goes on the run to find the real culprit across the United States.

title: Road to Morocco
description: Two castaways wash up on the shores of Morocco, where they get mixed up with a beautiful princess and a sheik.

title: In Which We Serve
description: The story of a British naval ship and its crew during the Battle of Crete in 1941.

title: The Talk of the Town
description: An escaped prisoner hides out in a schoolteacher's house, where he gets mixed up with a law professor renting it for the summer.

title: Kings Row
description: Dark secrets and tragedy befall the inhabitants of a small Midwestern town at the turn of the 20th century.

title: I Married a Witch
description: A witch burned at the stake in colonial America returns to haunt the descendants of the man who condemned her, only to fall in love with one of them.

title: The Major and the Minor
description: A woman masquerades as a 12-year-old girl to get a half-fare train ticket and ends up in a military academy.

title: Wake Island
description: The story of the U.S. Marine garrison's defense of Wake Island against the Japanese in the early days of World War II.

title: The Glass Key
description: A political boss is accused of murder, and his right-hand man must find the real killer while navigating a complex web of corruption.

title: Gentleman Jim
description: The story of James J. Corbett, the 19th-century heavyweight boxing champion who brought refinement to the sport.

title: The Black Swan
description: A former pirate is named Governor of Jamaica and tasked with ridding the Caribbean of his former colleagues.

title: Casablanca
description: A cynical American expatriate's cafe in Casablanca becomes a haven for refugees, and his life is turned upside down when his former lover appears.

title: Shadow of a Doubt
description: A young woman discovers her visiting uncle may not be the man he seems to be.

title: The Ox-Bow Incident
description: Two drifters are passing through a Western town, when news arrives that a local rancher has been murdered and his cattle stolen. The townspeople form a posse to catch the culprits.

title: The Life and Death of Colonel Blimp
description: The story of a British officer, from the Boer War to the Blitz, who must adapt to the changing times and his evolving relationships.

title: For Whom the Bell Tolls
description: During the Spanish Civil War, an American allied with the Republicans finds romance during a desperate mission to blow up a strategically important bridge.

title: The Song of Bernadette
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: In 1858 France, a young peasant girl has a vision of a 'beautiful lady' in a Lourdes grotto, but the local authorities and her own family are skeptical.

title: Heaven Can Wait
description: A deceased man presents himself to the devil to be admitted to Hell, but finds that he may not be evil enough to qualify.

title: The More the Merrier
description: During the World War II housing shortage in Washington, two men and a woman share a small apartment and find themselves in a romantic triangle.

title: I Walked with a Zombie
description: A nurse is hired to care for the wife of a sugar plantation owner in the Caribbean, who has been acting strangely. She soon learns that voodoo may be involved.

title: The Human Comedy
description: A young boy growing up in a small California town during World War II learns about life, love, and loss.

title: The Phantom of the Opera
description: A disfigured composer haunts the Paris Opera House, where he falls in love with a young soprano.

title: Sahara
description: An American tank crew in North Africa during World War II picks up a group of Allied stragglers and searches for water while evading the German army.

title: The Seventh Victim
description: A young woman in search of her missing sister discovers a satanic cult in New York's Greenwich Village, and finds that they may have something to do with her sister's disappearance.

title: Day of Wrath
description: In 17th-century Denmark, a young woman is accused of witchcraft and falls in love with the son of the pastor who is prosecuting her.

title: Watch on the Rhine
description: A German anti-Nazi activist and his family are threatened by a blackmailing houseguest in Washington, D.C.

title: The Leopard Man
description: A nightclub performer's publicity stunt with a leopard goes horribly wrong, leading to a series of gruesome murders in a small New Mexico town.

title: Cabin in the Sky
description: A gambler is killed and sent back to Earth for a second chance at redemption, but he's tempted by a beautiful singer and must choose between her and his faithful wife.

title: Stormy Weather
description: A musical revue showcasing some of the leading African-American performers of the day.

title: The Outlaw
description: Pat Garrett, Doc Holliday and Billy the Kid are involved in a love triangle with a beautiful woman.

title: This Land Is Mine
description: In a German-occupied European town, a timid schoolteacher finds the courage to resist the Nazis.

title: The Gang's All Here
description: A soldier falls for a chorus girl, but their romance is complicated by his engagement to another woman.

title: Madame Curie
description: The story of the scientific and romantic relationship between Marie and Pierre Curie.

title: Double Indemnity
description: An insurance representative lets himself be talked into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses the suspicion of his colleague.

title: Gaslight
description: Years after her aunt was murdered in her home, a young woman moves back into the house with her new husband. However, he has a secret that he will do anything to protect, even if it means driving his wife insane.

title: Laura
description: A police detective falls in love with the woman whose murder he is investigating.

title: Meet Me in St. Louis
description: In the year before the 1904 St. Louis World's Fair, the four daughters of a prosperous family learn lessons of life and love, even as they prepare for a reluctant move to New York.

title: Going My Way
description: A young priest, Father O'Malley, arrives at a financially troubled parish and his unconventional methods clash with the aging pastor.

title: To Have and Have Not
description: During World War II, American expatriate Harry Morgan helps transport a French Resistance leader and his beautiful wife to Martinique while romancing a sexy lounge singer.

title: Arsenic and Old Lace
description: A drama critic learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are homicidal maniacs, and that insanity runs in his family.

title: Lifeboat
description: Several survivors of a torpedoed ship find themselves in the same lifeboat with one of the U-boat's crew.

title: The Woman in the Window
description: A psychology professor's interest in a woman in a portrait leads to a dangerous obsession.

title: National Velvet
description: A young girl in rural England, with the help of a former jockey, trains a wild horse to compete in the Grand National Steeplechase.

title: Henry V
description: In the midst of the Hundred Years' War, the young King Henry V of England embarks on the conquest of France in 1415.

title: Since You Went Away
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A mother and her two daughters struggle to cope on the home front during World War II while the man of the house is away at war.

title: The Uninvited
description: A brother and sister buy a house in Cornwall that they soon discover is haunted.

title: Cover Girl
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: A chorus girl gets a chance at stardom when she is selected to be a magazine cover girl, but she must choose between the wealthy man who can make her a star and the man she loves.

title: Wilson
description: A biopic of the 28th U.S. President, Woodrow Wilson, chronicling his political career and his personal life.

title: The White Cliffs of Dover
description: An American woman in England during World War II reflects on her life and the losses she has endured.

title: Since You Went Away
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A mother and her two daughters struggle to cope on the home front during World War II while the man of the house is away at war.

title: The Uninvited
description: A brother and sister buy a house in Cornwall that they soon discover is haunted.

title: Cover Girl
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: A chorus girl gets a chance at stardom when she is selected to be a magazine cover girl, but she must choose between the wealthy man who can make her a star and the man she loves.

title: Wilson
description: A biopic of the 28th U.S. President, Woodrow Wilson, chronicling his political career and his personal life.

title: The White Cliffs of Dover
description: An American woman in England during World War II reflects on her life and the losses she has endured.

title: The Lodger
description: A landlady suspects her new lodger is Jack the Ripper.

title: The Miracle of Morgan's Creek
description: A young woman's one-night stand with a soldier during World War II results in pregnancy and a frantic search for a husband.

title: Hail the Conquering Hero
description: A young man, discharged from the Marines for hay fever, is mistaken for a war hero in his hometown.

title: The Lost Weekend
description: The desperate life of a chronic alcoholic is followed through a four-day drinking bout.

title: Brief Encounter
description: Two strangers, both married to others, meet in a railway station and find themselves in a brief, but intense, affair.

title: Mildred Pierce
description: A hard-working mother inches towards disaster as she divorces her husband and starts a successful restaurant business to support her spoiled daughter.

title: Children of Paradise
description: A beautiful and enigmatic woman is loved by four different men in 1830s Paris.

title: The Bells of St. Mary's
description: A new priest at a struggling Catholic school clashes with the headstrong nun who runs it.

title: Spellbound
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A psychiatrist protects the identity of an amnesiac patient, accused of murder, while attempting to recover his memory.

title: Detour
description: A man's life spirals out of control after he accidentally kills a hitchhiker and assumes his identity.

title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
description: A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all.

title: The Body Snatcher
description: A doctor in 19th-century Edinburgh finds himself in a morally compromising position when he resorts to buying bodies for his medical school.

title: Rome, Open City
description: During the Nazi occupation of Rome in 1944, the leader of the Italian Resistance is pursued by the Gestapo.

title: Leave Her to Heaven
description: A writer falls in love with a beautiful socialite and they marry, but he soon discovers that her love for him is a possessive and destructive obsession.

title: Anchors Aweigh
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: Two sailors on shore leave in Hollywood get mixed up with an aspiring singer and a young boy.

title: A Tree Grows in Brooklyn
description: A young girl in early 20th-century Brooklyn comes of age amidst the poverty and struggles of her family.

title: And Then There Were None
description: Ten people are invited to a remote island and are killed off one by one. They work together to determine which one of them is the killer.

title: The Southerner
description: A poor Texas farmer struggles to make a living for his family.

title: The Corn Is Green
description: A determined teacher in a Welsh mining town works to help a gifted young miner get into Oxford.

title: Saratoga Trunk
description: A Creole woman from New Orleans and a Texas gambler team up to conquer the high society of Saratoga Springs.

title: They Were Expendable
description: The story of a PT boat squadron in the Philippines during the early days of World War II.

title: Scarlet Street
description: A mild-mannered cashier, who is also a painter, falls for a beautiful woman and gets mixed up with her manipulative boyfriend.

title: The House on 92nd Street
description: A docudrama-style film about the FBI's efforts to thwart a Nazi spy ring in New York City during World War II.

title: A Walk in the Sun
description: A platoon of American soldiers in Italy during World War II must take a German-held farmhouse.

title: The Keys of the Kingdom
description: A Scottish priest spends 60 years as a missionary in China.

title: Blithe Spirit
description: A cynical writer invites a medium to his house for a sance, but gets more than he bargained for when she conjures up the ghost of his first wife.

title: The Valley of Decision
description: A young Irish housemaid in a Pittsburgh steel mill owner's family falls in love with the owner's son.

title: Love Letters
description: A soldier writes love letters for his friend to a woman he has never met. When the woman develops amnesia after a traumatic event, he tries to help her remember their love.

title: It's a Wonderful Life
description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

title: The Best Years of Our Lives
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: Three World War II veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

title: Notorious
description: A woman is asked to spy on a group of Nazi friends in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

title: The Big Sleep
description: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a wealthy family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.

title: Great Expectations
description: A humble orphan suddenly becomes a gentleman with the help of an unknown benefactor.

title: Gilda
description: A small-time gambler is hired to work for a casino owner, but his situation becomes complicated when he learns his old flame is the new boss's wife.

title: The Killers
description: An insurance investigator's trail of a dead former boxer who was murdered for a life-insurance policy leads him into a world of corruption and deceit.

title: My Darling Clementine
description: Wyatt Earp and his brothers move to Tombstone, Arizona, and events lead up to the famous gunfight at the O.K. Corral.

title: The Postman Always Rings Twice
description: A drifter and a married woman conspire to murder her husband, but their plan goes awry.

title: A Matter of Life and Death
description: A British WWII bomber pilot who cheats death must argue for his life in a celestial court.

title: The Yearling
description: A young boy in post-Civil War Florida adopts a fawn as a pet, but the animal's wild nature causes problems for the family.

title: The Razor's Edge
description: An American pilot traumatized by his experiences in World War I embarks on a spiritual journey, leaving his fiance and a life of wealth behind.

title: The Stranger
description: An investigator from the War Crimes Commission travels to Connecticut to find an infamous Nazi.

title: Duel in the Sun
description: A half-Native American woman's presence in a wealthy Texas family creates tensions that lead to tragedy.

title: Humoresque
description: A talented, but poor, violinist is taken under the wing of a wealthy, alcoholic socialite.

title: The Jolson Story
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: The story of the life of the great entertainer, Al Jolson.

title: Anna and the King of Siam
description: A British governess goes to Siam to be a teacher for the royal court in the 1860s.

title: The Harvey Girls
description: A group of waitresses in a frontier town in the 1890s must contend with the local saloon owner and his dance-hall girls.

title: Black Narcissus
description: A group of Anglican nuns in a remote Himalayan convent find their faith and self-discipline tested by the harsh environment and the presence of a cynical British agent.

title: The Bachelor and the Bobby-Soxer
description: A teenage girl's crush on a suave bachelor artist gets him in hot water with her judge sister, who orders him to date the girl until her infatuation wears off.

title: Life with Father
description: A loving but eccentric New York City family in the 1880s is ruled by the iron will of their patriarch, but his wife's quiet determination usually wins the day.

title: Crossfire
description: A police detective investigates the murder of a Jewish man, with a group of demobilized soldiers as the prime suspects.

title: The Farmer's Daughter
description: A determined young Swedish-American woman leaves her family's farm to become a nurse, but ends up working as a maid for a congressman, and her political savvy soon shines through.

title: Body and Soul
description: A young boxer rises through the ranks, but his success comes at a great moral cost.

title: A Double Life
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: An actor's life is dangerously influenced by the roles he plays, especially when he takes on the part of Othello.

title: Miracle on 34th Street
description: After a divorced New York mother hires a nice old man to play Santa Claus at Macy's, she is startled by his claim to be the genuine article.

title: Out of the Past
description: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him.

title: Gentleman's Agreement
description: A reporter pretends to be Jewish in order to cover a story on anti-Semitism, and personally discovers the true depths of bigotry and hatred.

title: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
description: In 1900s England, a young widow finds her seaside cottage is haunted and forms a unique relationship with the ghost.

title: The Lady from Shanghai
description: Fascinated by the beauty of a mysterious woman, a smitten man joins her and her husband on their yacht, but their cruise is not as idyllic as it seems.

title: The Bachelor and the Bobby-Soxer
description: A teenage girl's crush on a suave bachelor artist gets him in hot water with her judge sister, who orders him to date the girl until her infatuation wears off.

title: Life with Father
description: A loving but eccentric New York City family in the 1880s is ruled by the iron will of their patriarch, but his wife's quiet determination usually wins the day.

title: Crossfire
description: A police detective investigates the murder of a Jewish man, with a group of demobilized soldiers as the prime suspects.

title: The Farmer's Daughter
description: A determined young Swedish-American woman leaves her family's farm to become a nurse, but ends up working as a maid for a congressman, and her political savvy soon shines through.

title: Body and Soul
description: A young boxer rises through the ranks, but his success comes at a great moral cost.

title: A Double Life
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: An actor's life is dangerously influenced by the roles he plays, especially when he takes on the part of Othello.

title: The Bishop's Wife
description: An angel in human form enters the life of a bishop and his wife to help them in their quest for a new cathedral.

title: Dark Passage
description: A man convicted of murdering his wife escapes from prison and works with a woman to try and prove his innocence.

title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
description: A timid magazine proofreader who escapes his mundane life by daydreaming of being a hero gets mixed up in a real-life adventure.

title: The Paradine Case
description: A happily married London barrister falls in love with the accused poisoner he is defending.

title: Odd Man Out
description: The leader of an illegal Irish nationalist organization is wounded in a botched robbery and must evade the police.

title: Monsieur Verdoux
description: A former bank clerk marries and murders rich widows to support his family.

title: Black Narcissus
description: A group of Anglican nuns in a remote Himalayan convent find their faith and self-discipline tested by the harsh environment and the presence of a cynical British agent.

title: The Fugitive
description: A Catholic priest on the run in a Latin American country where religion is outlawed.

title: Brute Force
description: A group of prisoners in a brutal penitentiary plot an escape, led by a tough inmate and opposed by a sadistic guard.

title: Nightmare Alley
description: An ambitious carny with a talent for manipulating people and a knack for the bizarre rises to the top of the spiritualist racket, but his own dark past may be his undoing.

title: Mourning Becomes Electra
description: A New England family is torn apart by incest, murder, and revenge in the aftermath of the American Civil War.

title: The Macomber Affair
description: On a big-game safari in Africa, a married couple's relationship is complicated by the presence of a professional hunter.

title: Johnny O'Clock
description: A junior partner in a gambling joint is suspected of murdering a crooked cop.

title: Forever Amber
description: An ambitious woman rises from poverty to become the mistress of King Charles II of England.

title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
description: Two Americans searching for work in Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

title: Bicycle Thieves
description: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen, endangering his efforts to support his family.

title: The Red Shoes
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A young ballerina is torn between the man she loves and her pursuit to become a prima ballerina.

title: Rope
description: Two men attempt to prove they committed the perfect crime by hosting a dinner party after strangling a former classmate and hiding his body in a chest.

title: Hamlet
description: Prince Hamlet struggles over whether or not he should kill his uncle, whom he suspects has murdered his father, the former king.

title: Key Largo
description: A man visits his war buddy's family hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

title: Red River
description: A rancher leads a massive cattle drive from Texas to Missouri, but his tyrannical leadership causes a mutiny.

title: The Snake Pit
description: A young woman in a mental institution struggles to remember how she got there.

title: Sorry, Wrong Number
description: A bedridden woman overhears a murder plot on the phone and frantically tries to prevent it.

title: Johnny Belinda
description: A doctor in a small Nova Scotia town helps a deaf-mute woman, who is misunderstood by the community, learn to communicate.

title: Fort Apache
description: A stubborn cavalry commander, resentful of his new post, clashes with a more experienced captain and endangers his command with his arrogance.

title: The Naked City
description: A police procedural following two detectives as they investigate a model's murder in New York City.

title: Easter Parade
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: A nightclub performer hires a chorus girl as his new partner to make his former partner jealous, but he falls in love with her.

title: The Pirate
description: A young woman, engaged to a stuffy older man, fantasizes about a notorious pirate. A traveling actor impersonates the pirate to win her love.

title: I Remember Mama
description: A Norwegian immigrant family in San Francisco in the early 20th century is held together by their loving and self-sacrificing mother.

title: Unfaithfully Yours
description: A symphony conductor's jealousy and suspicions about his wife's fidelity lead him to imagine three different scenarios for dealing with the situation, each inspired by the music he is conducting.

title: State of the Union
description: An idealistic industrialist is urged to run for president, but he is torn between his principles and the compromises of politics.

title: The Lady from Shanghai
description: Fascinated by the beauty of a mysterious woman, a smitten man joins her and her husband on their yacht, but their cruise is not as idyllic as it seems.

title: Letter from an Unknown Woman
description: On the eve of a duel, a concert pianist receives a letter from a woman he cannot remember, who tells him the story of their tragic love affair.

title: The Search
description: In postwar Germany, an American soldier helps a lost Czech boy find his mother.

title: Force of Evil
description: A lawyer for a powerful mobster gets his idealistic older brother involved in the numbers racket.

title: Adventures of Don Juan
description: The legendary lover Don Juan is sent to the court of Spain to serve the queen, but his reputation precedes him, and he finds himself in the middle of court intrigue.

title: The Paleface
description: A bumbling dentist and a sharpshooting cowgirl get mixed up with outlaws and Indians in the Old West.

title: Portrait of Jennie
description: A struggling artist meets a mysterious young woman who becomes his muse, but her appearances are fleeting and seem to defy time.

title: Joan of Arc
description: The story of Joan of Arc, the French peasant girl who led the French army to victory over the English in the Hundred Years' War.

title: The Third Man
description: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

title: All the King's Men
description: The rise and fall of a corrupt politician, who makes his way from the backwoods to the governor's mansion.

title: White Heat
description: A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring break from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist.

title: Adam's Rib
description: Domestic and professional tensions mount when a husband and wife work as opposing lawyers in a case involving a woman who shot her husband.

title: On the Town
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: Three sailors on a 24-hour shore leave in New York City search for love and adventure.

title: The Heiress
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A plain and painfully shy woman, who stands to inherit her wealthy father's fortune, falls in love with a handsome suitor, despite her father's protestations.

title: Kind Hearts and Coronets
description: A distant poor relative of the Duke of D'Ascoyne plots to inherit the title by murdering the eight other heirs who stand ahead of him in the line of succession.

title: A Letter to Three Wives
description: A letter is delivered to three friends from a woman who has run off with one of their husbands.

title: Sands of Iwo Jima
description: A tough-as-nails Marine sergeant is despised by his own men, but his stringent training prepares them for the bloody battle of Iwo Jima.

title: The Fountainhead
description: An uncompromising, visionary architect struggles to maintain his integrity and individualism despite pressure from a conformist society.

title: She Wore a Yellow Ribbon
description: A cavalry captain on the verge of retirement is tasked with one last mission to quell a Native American uprising.

title: Stray Dog
description: A young detective's gun is stolen, and he must track it down in the criminal underworld of postwar Tokyo.

title: The Set-Up
description: An aging boxer is set up to take a fall, but his pride and his wife's pleas lead him to make a fateful decision.

title: Battleground
description: A squad of American soldiers is trapped in the besieged city of Bastogne during the Battle of the Bulge.

title: Criss Cross
description: An armored car driver's obsession with his ex-wife leads him into a dangerous heist planned by her gangster husband.

title: Little Women
description: The March sisters live in Concord, Massachusetts during and after the American Civil War.

title: The Stratton Story
description: The story of baseball player Monty Stratton, who loses a leg in a hunting accident and makes a courageous comeback.

title: Twelve O'Clock High
description: A tough-as-nails general takes over a struggling bomber group in World War II and whips them into shape.

title: Samson and Delilah
description: The biblical story of the strongman Samson and his betrayal by the beautiful Delilah.

title: The Reckless Moment
description: A mother's life is thrown into turmoil when she discovers her daughter's lover is dead and becomes entangled with a blackmailer.

title: Champion
description: A ruthless boxer claws his way to the top, but his ambition costs him his friends and family.

title: Mighty Joe Young
description: A young woman who has raised a giant gorilla from infancy brings him to Hollywood to become a star, but he is exploited and provoked into a destructive rampage.

title: The Barkleys of Broadway
description: A successful husband-and-wife musical comedy team's relationship is strained when the wife decides she wants to be a serious dramatic actress.

title: Neptune's Daughter
description: A swimsuit designer and a polo player's romance is complicated by a case of mistaken identity.

title: The Secret Garden
description: An orphaned girl is sent to live at her uncle's great house in England where she discovers a magical, walled-in garden.

title: In the Good Old Summertime
description: Two employees at a Chicago music store who can't stand each other are unaware that they are conducting an anonymous romantic correspondence.
